The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 28 September is 3,447 (399 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 24 September, there were 123 new confirmed cases (14.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 September, there were 110 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 12% (13 extra cases).
